snippet: A Russian politician said on Saturday he had been badly beaten after publicising the mysterious funerals of two soldiers who may have died while fighting in Ukraine....

headline.print_headline: Russian Politician Beaten After Report on Soldier Burials
headline.main: Russian Politician Beaten After Report on Soldier Burials

lead_paragraph: A Russian politician said on Saturday he had been badly beaten after publicising the mysterious funerals of two soldiers who may have died while fighting in Ukraine.
